meanings.definition: A small hot-tasting pod of a variety of capsicum, used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some chopped chilli to the soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The chilli in the curry gave it a nice kick.
meanings.sent3: The chilli jumped out of the pot and into the pan!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of chilli in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The red chilli looked like a fiery gem in the garden.

meanings.definition: A hot-tasting spice made from the dried and ground fruits of a cultivated variety of capsicum.
